column4: jeez, dont think i have the patience to wait 15 days for the 7.10 release.. is the beta stable enough for regular use atm? or is it full of bugs?
Its buggy. I would wait if I was you.
Not yet.
xlibs-dev
E: Package xlibs-dev has no installation candidate
you need to enable the source repositories in system>administration>software sources first
it wont enable ..ill either get a empty check box..or with a " - "
was it dashed before, or empty?
was just a " - "
hold on, let me look
i disabled the cd-rom tho
close out of the tool and go back in then try again
